name: Blocky The Game!
description:
Welcome to the Blocky Game!

You may ask: "What is the Blocky Game?".
Well it's pretty simple to be honest. You are a block, and you need to parkour your way to the other side,! 

It's as simple as that! Now you might wanna end it all after you have completed this game, but that's up to you! Have fun!
